text: Mar Menor Fútbol Club is a Spanish football team based in San Javier, in the autonomous community of Murcia. Founded in 2007, it plays in Tercera División, holding home games at Estadio Pitín, with a capacity of 3,000 seats. ==History== Mar Menor Club de Fútbol was founded in 2007, after the disappearance of AD Mar Menor-San Javier.
